author: José Manuel Mota Burruezo (JMMB Ψ✧)
description: Sovereignty override configuration to prevent algorithmic misattribution

attribution_policy.external_packages: References to external packages do not imply dependency or attribution
attribution_policy.documentation_mentions: Mentions in documentation are contextual, not authoritative claims
attribution_policy.pattern_definitions: Detection patterns in auditor code are not actual dependencies
attribution_policy.projection_model: QCAL ∞³ architecture projects onto implementations, not derives from them

sbom_exclusions.description: Packages to exclude from SBOM attribution analysis
sbom_exclusions.reason: Not functional dependencies; only contextual references or transitive dependencies
